oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Jack Pearson - 2016-11-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jack Pearson as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond program from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 19, 2016. First performer of four. Presented by the Crump family and Cotton Music. Honoring George A. and Marjorie S. Crump.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jack Pearson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performance includes: Glory, Glory (Lay My Burden Down) -- Do What's Right -- Everyday -- Just Believe -- Unidentified Instrumental -- Mr. Engineer -- Don't Give Up -- My Old Friend -- Unidentified Performance (which may be titled Light Of God's Love) -- I Can Fix It -- Oh Glory, How Happy I Am.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pearson, Jack; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
